title: Asian markets mostly rise after central bank decisions
text:
Hong Kong (CNN Business) Asian markets mostly rose on Thursday after the Federal Reserve cut rates, while Japan's central bank kept monetary policy unchanged.

Nikkei 225 N225 Kospi KOSPI Shanghai Composite Index SHCOMP Japan'srose 0.6%. South Korea'sgained 0.3%. China'smoved up by less than 0.1%.

. But the central bank expressed concerns about risks to the global economic outlook and said it will reexamine economic and price developments at the next policy meeting in October. On Thursday morning, the Bank of Japan kept its monetary policy steady. It maintained short-term interest rates at minus 0.1% and its target for ten-year government bond yields at 0%But the central bank expressedconcerns about risks to the global economic outlook and said it will reexamine economic and price developments at the next policy meeting in October.

Hang Seng Index HSI after opening in positive territory. Hong Kong'sbucked the trend in Asia, dropping 1.2%after opening in positive territory.

description: Asian markets mostly rose on Thursday after the Federal Reserve cut rates, while Japan's central bank kept monetary policy unchanged.
